commentBody: Getting harder and harder to be an NFL fan anymore. Once was. Watched no games this year. The spoiled and pampered owners, the off field controversies, the constant sticking it to the fan base, was just too much. It seems that the NFL, like a lot of things in America, is based entirely on an advertising strategy, and nothing of substance. The league is becoming pure spectacle. Just look at what the Super Bowl has become. The actual playing is now incidental.
